title: Begin
body:
<< Hanni.T >> 
Hello boss what brings you here this early
<< BoB.A>>|
WELP, you are very behind on your debt payments and money aint free you know.
<< Hanni.T  >> 
I will pay you back I just need more time
<< BoB.A>>|
WELP, you're in luck, I will cut you a deal.
<< BoB.A >> 
Im giving you till noon to pay your first debt of 200
<< BoB.A >> 
Im giving you till evening  to pay your second debt of 1000
<< BoB.A >> 
Im giving you till midnight to pay your third debt of 20000
<< Hanni.T >>|
All in one day mama mia 
<< Hanni.T >>|
Oh well you got it 
<< BoB.A >> 
DONT BE LATE OR ELSE THE SHOP IS MINE
